iti1:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti1:2.4: Greed is the one thing. Give it up,
iti1:2.6: That is what the Buddha said.
iti1:3.2: beings go to a bad place.
iti1:3.6: they never return to this world.”
iti1:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
